name: Nathan Anderson
body:
# Current
I love coding Ruby, and I'm learning Puppet.  15 years experience as a Solaris/Linux Admin, 10 years doing web development, 4 years hacking with Ruby/Rails.

I also run the [OpenHack meetup in Louisville, KY](http://openhack.github.com/louisville/).

##Follow me around
* [@mr_ndrsn](http://twitter.com/mr_ndrsn) at Twitter
* [@anoldguy](http://github.com/anoldguy) at github
